PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In the device that blended the PQCDTB and PC71BM in a 1 : 1 ratio , V OC , J SC , and FF were 0.79 V , 5.6 mA cm^-2 , and 55.8% , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

1. VOC: This is a "Property Name" entity in the paragraph. It refers to the open-circuit voltage of the device.
2. J SC: This is another "Property Name" entity in the paragraph. It refers to the short-circuit current density of the device.
3. FF: This is also a "Property Name" entity in the paragraph. It refers to the fill factor of the device.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. VOC: This is a "Material Property" entity in the paragraph. It refers to the open-circuit voltage of the device.
2. J SC: This is another "Material Property" entity in the paragraph. It refers to the short-circuit current density of the device.
3. FF: This is also a "Material Property" entity in the paragraph. It refers to the fill factor of the device.

Note: PQCDTB and PC71BM are likely names of materials or components used in the device, but they are not explicitly referred to as properties in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| VOC |
| J SC |
| FF |
